products.name: Murphy Original Wood Cleaner Oil Soap Citronella Oil Scent

extendedInfo.detail: Since 1910. Cleans cares restores. 99% naturally derived (Specially formulated with: water, coconut & plant-derived cleaning ingredients, natural fragrance, and less than 1% synthetic ingredients). Biodegradable cleaning ingredients. Citronella oil scent. The original oil soap. The real deal since 1910. Finished Wood Surfaces: Wood floors. Wood paneling. Bookcases. Tables & chairs. Cabinets. Laminated floors. Non-Wood Surfaces: No-wax floors. Ceramic tile. Painted surfaces. Laundry stains. Cars. Leather. Vinyl. Made with pride. SmartLabel. Visit SmartLabel.colgate.com for ingredient information.  Questions? 1-800-486-7627. www.murphyoilsoap.com.  Save water. www.colgate.com/savewater.
extendedInfo.ingredients: Water, Sodium Tallate, Propanediol, Cymbopogon Nardus (Citronella) Oil, Sodium Chloride, Tetrasodium EDTA, Lauramidopropylamine Oxide.
extendedInfo.directions: Directions for Use on Flours: Dilute 1/4 cup Murphy in 1 gallon warm water. For heavy cleaning, dilute 1/2 cup Murphy per gallon. Clean well with wrung-out mop, and mop any excess water. No visible residue, no rinsing required.
extendedInfo.warnings: First Aid: If product contacts eyes, rinse thoroughly with water. If eye irritation persists, contact a physician. If swallowed, drink 1-2 glasses of water and seek medical attention. Due to formula differences, do not use this as a refill for other Murphy products.Warning: Keep out of reach of children. Do not drink. Note: Murphy Original Oil Soap should not be used on unfinished, unsealed, or waxed wood surfaces because they may be water sensitive. Before using on an unknown surface, test on inconspicuous area. Dulling or discoloration indicates that the wood may be waxed or needs refinishing.
